title: One injured in accidental shooting near Burlington
content:
BURLINGTON — One person was injured in an apparent accidental shooting outside Burlington today.
Emergency personnel responded about 2:35 p.m. to reports of a cardiac arrest at 5612 Mt. Vernon Church Road, according to dispatchers.
Emergency personnel found a victim suffering from a gunshot wound. The victim’s injuries were not available.
Early indications point to the shooting being accidental, according to the Alamance County Sheriff’s Office.
